text: The Sweden national under-17 football team represents Sweden in youth international football completions. They finished third at the 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup in the United Arab Emirates. ==Competitive record== Champions Runners-up Third place Fourth place Tournament held on home soil ===FIFA World Cup===
